Computer.name: Laura Nakamura Laptop
Computer.file:
On 24 May, 201X, Z3r0 wrote,
Hey, Laura. Don't worry about your Geology degree. One of my agents took care of it. Are you sure you don't want to help me with the project? Your talents would be invaluable.
Please think about it. -Z3r0 ================================= On 25 May, 201X, Nakamura wrote,
Hey, thanks. I can't join your little project, and you KNOW why. I'm too tied up with work at the moment.
-Laura ================================= On 26 May, 201X, Z3r0 wrote,
Work, work, work. Just like high school, haha
